originalText.text:
I highly recommend Mr Stephen Perlitsh to anyone in need of immigration assistance. Their professionalism and expertise made all the difference in my cases and I am grateful for their help. Thank you Mr Perlitsh, and extend my regards to the team in the office for your outstanding service through the years.
J Marenco

text.text:

originalText.text: I had the pleasure of working with Mr. Perlitsh and his team, and the experience was nothing short of exceptional. They provided me with prompt and comprehensive insights regarding my issue, and were very diligent in their follow-up efforts. I would highly recommend Mr. Perlitsh and his team to anyone in need of their services.

text.text: I had the pleasure of working with Mr. Perlitsh and his team, and the experience was nothing short of exceptional. They provided me with prompt and comprehensive insights regarding my issue, and were very diligent in their follow-up efforts. I would highly recommend Mr. Perlitsh and his team to anyone in need of their services.

originalText.text: I had a pleasant experience working with Mr. Perlitsh and his entire team Ms. Arias, Kathy, and Debbie. They are very supportive, knowledgeable, dedicated, helpful, and very good at responding to all your email throughout a very long process of H1b to Green card.  It has been a very long wait, but they have made it very smooth.  I highly recommend the Perlitsh firm for any immigration-related matters who wish to have a smooth, stress-free immigration process.

originalText.text: Mr. Perlitsh and his team helped me all the way through my Green Card application, they were always available to guide, help and answer my questions and thanks to him I got My Green Card.

originalText.text: Mr. Perlitsh is very hands on and accommodating. His staff provides very good assistance. Everyone responds to inquiries immediately and gives clear instructions.
